data.title: Welcome to SAIC
data.text:
2024 Corporate Responsibility Report

Our fifth annual report details our progress on environmental, social and governance principles, sustainability and positively impacting our communities and the world.

View our interactive report

Warfighting Data in Space

We are helping Space Development Agency build its Application Factory that will deliver on-orbit mission apps for satellite-based battle management as part of DOD all-domain warfighting.

Read about our work to improve threat awareness and response

CJADC2's Data Interoperability

In support of DOD all-domain warfighting for battlespace superiority, we are engineering data-centric information systems for U.S. joint forces, allies and international partners.

Learn more about our CJADC2 work and solutions

Elevated Mission Decision-Making

SAIC helps government to better analyze missions through data convergence and interoperability, and then we raise human strategic thinking with artificial-intelligence enhancement.

Learn more about our Data and AI solutions
